title: New: BANKS – Brain (Produced By Shlohmo)
body:
Rapidly rising LA songstress **BANKS** teams up with yet another of the hottest producers around right now for new track Brain.

With her top 5 placing in the BBC Sound of 2014 poll, alongside almost every other 2014 predictions list, BANKS is all set for the big time. New cut, Brain is by far her boldest outing to date, far more suitable for the festival live circuit than her previous material, which coincidently, is where she’ll be spending the majority of her summer.
